script.name: changeMvnJVMSettingsInFreestyleJobs.groovy
script.comment: This script finds all Maven Tasks registered in freestyle jobs and replace JVM Options by a new value.

script.name: displayJobParameters.groovy
script.comment: This scripts displays the parameters for all the jobs along with their default values (if applicable).

script.name: listFailedJobs.groovy
script.comment: If you have a lot of job configured on your Hudson installation, you maybe want to have a list of job which last run fails.
